text: Is it possible to add more field to the author? like function and other fields?

Hi @all Need Urgent Help


We have create one app in dev account for CRM cards and installed in another account. We have hosted it at siteground and we are using IP tp point that. It was working perfect.
Once SSL expired it stops working with error SSL not found and then we have installed SSl on that server but still showing same error.
Can some one please help me ?
Or you can create a custom module and load it into the article
"currentName" ?
ahhh ok, now it makes sense :slightly_smiling_face:
Sadly it is still not working :disappointed:
the for loop without the if-condition works, right?
Yes
<@U051U23LBKP> so what is the use case and where it is being used?
Found the problem already. It didn't work due to the white space inbetween the first name and surname :slightly_smiling_face:

<@UBT0AHWLD> helped me finding te solution :crown:

```{{ demo.name|lower|regex_replace(" [^a-zA-Z] ", " ")|replace(" ", "-") }}. ```
Due to the whitespace in the name it would not work working with regex_replace filter this out and change it.

I made to solution so it filters on the email :joy: (I am not thinking in problems :wink:)
This regex filter makes sure that everything is written in lower-case,  spaces are removed and replaced with a "-"
Great! thanks a lot for the tip

there is some CSS hiding it

Hi All, is there a way to integrate the HubSpot tracking code on a wordpress site made with Elementor? I have integrated, via the API, HubSpot and Active Campaign (my CRM) but they are still not talking to each other. I have also tried to integrate the HubSpot plug in on my WP site but it is not working. Any help would be greatly appreciated.
